a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: COVID-19 vaccine doses donated to COVAX
Doses donated to the COVAX initiative by each country.

g.text: Shipped by COVAX to a recipient countryShipped by COVAX to a recipient country
Announced but not yet donatedAnnounced but not yet donated

text.tspan: Data source: COVAX, ACT-Accelerator Hub (23 March 2022)
Note: COVAX is a worldwide initiative aimed at equitable access to COVID-19 vaccines. It is directed by Gavi, CEPI, and the WHO.
